```{r, flextableprops}
#| echo: false 
#| warning: false 
#| eval: true 
#| include: false

table_format <- function(csv, width, size) {
rawtable<-flextable(csv)
table<-fontsize(rawtable, size=size)%>%
font(fontname ="Times New Roman")%>%
font(fontname ="Times New Roman",part='header')%>%
width(width = width)%>%
align(align='center')%>%
 align(align='center',part='header')
}

```



